Title: Automated Desk Review Vendor Code
Description: Vendor for Fiscal Intermediary.
Valid Entries: 2 or A03 - E & Y                              3 or A01 - KPMG                         4 or A05 - HFS

Title: Alphanumeric Item Text
Description: Provider reported alpha data.

Title: Column Number
Description: Valid Column Number defined as follows:  xxxyy where xxx = Column Number and yy = Sub-Column Number

Title: Column Number
Description: Valid Column Number defined as follows:  xxyy where xx = Column Number and yy = Sub-Column Number

Title: Fiscal Intermediary Create Date
Description: Date the FI created the HCRIS file.

Title: Fiscal Intermediary Number
Description: Fiscal Intermediary Number in effect at the time of cost report filing.

Title: Fiscal Intermediary Receipt Date
Description: Date cost report was received by Fiscal Intermediary.

Title: Fiscal Year Begin Date
Description: Cost Report Fiscal Year beginning date.

Title: Fiscal Year End Date
Description: Cost Report Fiscal Year ending date.

Title: Initial Report Switch
Description: Y or N, Y = the first cost report filed for this provider. (Not actively used.)

Title: Item Value Number
Description: Provider reported numeric data.

Title: Last Report Switch
Description: Y or N, Y = the final cost report filed for this provider. (Not actively used.)

Title: Line Number
Description: Valid Line Number defined as follows: xxxyy where xxx = Line Number and yy = Sub-Line Number

Title: Notice of Program Reimbursement Date
Description: Date Provider received NPR.

Title: National Provider Identifier
Description: Unique health identifier for health care providers.  Established under HIPAA.

Title: Process Date
Description: The date the cost report was processed into HCRIS.

Title: Provider Control Type Code
Description: Type of ownership from Table 3A of Specifications.

Title: Provider Number
Description: Valid Provider Number defined as follows:  xxyyyy where xx = State Code and yyyy = Assigned Provider Range

Title: Report Record Number
Description: HCRIS assigned cost report specific number.

Title: Report Status Code
Description: Type of cost report.
Valid Entries: 1 = As Submitted            2 = Settled w/o Audit        3 = Settled with Audit  4 = Reopened                      5 = Amended

Title: Special Indicator
Description: HCRIS code used for special purposes.

Title: The current transmittal or version number in effect for each sub-system.
Description: Transmittal Number or transmittal version used to create the cost report

Title: Utilization Code
Description: Level of Medicare utilization of filed cost report.
Valid Entries: L - Low Medicare Util           N - No Medicare Util    F - Full Medicare Util      Blank - Full Medicare Util

Title: Rollup label
Description: Descriptive text label

Title: Rollup value
Description: Rollup number.

Title: Worksheet Identifier
Description: Valid worksheets are defined for each subsystem in other documentation.
